definition: to grow/to nourish/to increase/to cause/juice/taste/(dialect) to spout/to spurt

sentences.english: The Rose pink clay will make the skin feel fresh and moisturized.
sentences.chinese: 玫瑰粉泥将使面部的肌肤倍感滋润和清新。

sentences.english: His breasts are full of milk, and his bones are moistened with marrow.
sentences.chinese: 他的奶桶充满，他的骨髓滋润。

sentences.english: As a kind of oil, it is surprisingly water-soluble and can be thoroughly wash off with water.
sentences.chinese: 没有紧绷感，并能留住滋润，让洗脸也变成一种享受。

sentences.english: Contains rich emollients found in jojoba oil and avocado oil.
sentences.chinese: 含有荷荷巴油及牛油果油之丰富滋润成分。

sentences.english: The centuries-old Qilu culture has nurtured this vast fertile land.
sentences.chinese: 数千年的齐鲁文化滋润着这片广饶沃土。

sentences.english: Your hair will radiate with rich, natural-looking color and luminescent shine.
sentences.chinese: 令你的秀发更加滋润，健康，散发迷人的色彩和光泽。

sentences.english: Infuse skin with fresh, oil-free hydration all day, see it glow with health.
sentences.chinese: 为皮肤注入大量保湿成分，清爽不油腻，滋润一整天。

sentences.english: A very nourishing and non-greasy hand cream. Uses all natural ingredients from Southern Alps.
sentences.chinese: 一支非常幼滑滋润而不油腻的护手霜。

sentences.english: It moisturizes the skin and the elasticity gets better as well.
sentences.chinese: 它不但能滋润肌肤，更使肌肤变得有弹性。

sentences.english: How to moisturize your face after shaving in this free personal care video.
sentences.chinese: 如何滋润后，在这个自由个人护理视频剃须你的脸。

sentences.english: The spring breeze blew the green Eastern divine land, the spring rain has moistened the China native place.
sentences.chinese: 春风啊吹绿了东方神州，春雨啊滋润了华夏故园。

sentences.english: Spring grain gradually break, after the rain of the campus, every corner are water moistens.
sentences.chinese: 春雨渐歇，雨后的校园，每一个角落都被春水滋润着。

sentences.english: Therefore, the diet chooses also suitably selects cool moistens gentle.
sentences.chinese: 所以，饮食选择上也宜选用清凉滋润平和之品。

sentences.english: Water creates wood but restricts fire, mirroring the nourishing and flourishing nature.
sentences.chinese: 水生木克火曰则上，具滋润向上，钻研之性。

sentences.english: I love your sugarcane in our hometown, which moistens my heart like breast milk.
sentences.chinese: 我爱你家乡的甜蔗，好像乳汁滋润着我的心窝。

sentences.english: People steal, don't get caught, but live the good life.
sentences.chinese: 小偷，不一定被逮到，还活得很滋润。

definition: (of dry soil, skin etc) to crack/to chap
to dry (of weather, paint, cement etc)/desiccation/dull/uninteresting/arid
